issue.title: Fix pyarrow.types & gandiva cython bindings
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3742](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3742). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
1. 'types.py' didn't export `_as_type`, causing failures in certain cython/python combinations. I am surprised to see that the CI didn't fail.
2. After updating the gandiva cpp part (ARROW-3587), the cython bindings (ARROW-3602) are not consistent.
